concept.title: 5611.274-90 Item Unique Item Identification (IUID)/Unique Item Identifier (UII) and Military Equipment Evaluation (MEV).

conbody.p: It is USSOCOM policy that IUIDs or DOD recognized UID equivalents, shall be incorporated in solicitations and contracts in accordance with DFARS 211.274 . DFARS clause 252.211-7003 shall be incorporated into any solicitation and contract for procurement of tangible assets as directed by the Program Manager in the procurement request package.

In accordance with DFARS 211.274-3, contractors shall be required to identify the Governmentâ€™s unit acquisition cost for all items delivered, even if none of the criteria for placing a unique item identification mark applies. DFARS 252.211-7003(a) defines unit acquisition cost.
Follow procedures found in the DCG for IUID/UII and MEV.
